summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) form used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being interviewed voluntarily as part of an investigation. The form includes a waiver section for the witness to sign, acknowledging their understanding and willingness to participate. The specific subject of the investigation is partially redacted.
keyFacts: The document is an OIG Form 111.226/2, dated 05/03/21, used for non-custodial employee interviews.
It outlines the voluntary nature of the interview and legal warnings regarding the use of any statements provided.
The specific subject of the investigation is heavily redacted, with only fragments like '6 eC-.L1Ct+•1 tcatklf(e. and JO 1.3 p-laC -Cot - MA.4Ve - 4ct.'‘Sklee-' visible.
The form includes a waiver section for the witness to sign, confirming no promises, threats, or coercion were used.
The witness's name and the specific place of the interview within New York are not provided in the visible text.
